duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute account strategy and sales pursuits for IT Managed Services, including End User IT Services, Cloud And Infrastructure Services, Project Bases IT Services, and Staffing Solutions.
Collaborate with the extended team to drive Milestone’s solutions in the marketplace and serve as a trusted adviser and partner to prospective and existing clients.
Lead the penetration of greenfield/new logo accounts, build a strong pipeline, and drive opportunities to meet/exceed sales expectations.

Understand Milestone services and abilities, represent them clearly to business leaders at different levels, and develop strategies with key stakeholders to address ongoing business and technical/IT support needs.
Govern all aspects of the sales process, maintain multiple opportunities simultaneously, and follow internal Sales process with updated CRM system.

Utilize common Sales tools including Customer Relationship Management systems, research, and prospecting tools to formulate comprehensive plans that include account mapping and addressable market analyses.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
